title: Deluxe Leather Case with Built-in Stand for Apple iPad (Red)
description: A must-have for your ipad! Whether in your lap, on your desk, or on a coffee table, make the most of your ipad's media capabilities with this revolutionary leather Case/Folio! Anywhere you set it, the versatile stand allows you to pick the most comfortable viewing angle. Don't slouch over your device for hours, or tire out your wrists! Simply flip around the cover and snap the stand into a comfortable, stress-free viewing position. The case also provides a luxury book-style reading experience for your favorite publications in portrait mode, and sports a stylish high-quality leather cover to protect your ipad screen from nicks and scratches. Don't settle for less, get the best of everything with this multi-view Case with stand for your iPad.
